text: Fotbal Club Petrolul Ploiești (), commonly known as Petrolul Ploiești, or simply as Petrolul, is a Romanian professional football club based in Ploiești, Prahova County. They play in the Liga II. Petrolul's traditional rival is Rapid București. Petrolul has a mild rivalry with Astra Giurgiu. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in Romania Category:Romanian football clubs Category:Prahova County
title: FC Petrolul Ploiești
